name: platform harry
description:
Description

harry is the "GUY" he wants to get the coin at the end of every level to be able to buy his favorite soda 

DevLog 

1.0v game is development no soda or coins yet so you will have to wait 

1.1v i just updated the drawings sprites and made a pad to jump on and a coin to collect 

A word from Me

"i made the first game to start a experiment to see if people would like the game harry the plat former and i guess 1 person did so i will update my game probably will update the game every few weeks i will learn how to add a tittle screen and level loose and win systems  " -Creator
